actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the collection of State taxes by the withholding, by Federal agencies, of State taxes from the pay of Federal employees if a State provides that any employee may voluntarily elect the withholding.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to enter into agreements providing for the withholding of State income taxes from the pay of Federal employees with States which impose a duty on employers generally to withhold and make returns of sums to State taxes, for any employee who elects.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide for the collection of State taxes by the withholding, by Federal agencies, of State taxes from the pay of Federal employees if a State provides that any employee may voluntarily elect the withholding.
